profile.value: 2 year 10 months of experience including Software development, product development Client/Server and Windows application.

Excellent communication skills have always been an asset in completing business venture and projects with success.
Quick Learner with the ability to rapidly achieve organizational integration, assimilate job requirements and employ new methodologies. Energetic and self motivated team player/builder.

project.description: The project was about creating a web portal for cafeteria management where the target user may view the menu, add menu and book meals. My role in the project was to build the whole frontend part from scratch.
project.title: CAFETERIA MANAGEMENT SYSTEM | MINDTREE (KALINGA) | FEB 2017-APRIL 2017

project.title: LIBRARY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM | MINDTREE (KALINGA) | FEB 2017-APRIL 2017

project.description: The project was built on ionic 3 in frontend and springboot in backend. I was working as a full stack on this project. Medpro is a insurance-based company. I was working for around 6 months for this project. My role was to handle changes in UI and as well as backend.
project.title: MEDPRO | MINDTREE (BANGLORE) | APRIL 2017-SEPTEMBER 2017

project.description: Since I was a part of CTO function I got tagged to COE group i.e. Center of Excellence group of CTO function so there I was working for the project “Symentic search”. It was a mindtree internal project. I was working in machine learning in python and java as well.

project.description: MOSIP is Modular Open Source Identification Platform. It is an open source framework to be built on springboot microservices on top of which any country can implement their UI to create unique identification for their citizen. The first Country to use this product was Philippines. I visited Manila as well for setting up this project to enroll people for this platform.
project.title: MOSIP | MINDTREE (BANGLORE) | JULY 2017 - ONGOING
